ValidationRule.description: If Post-Verto Plans are "Already Committed To Plans", the student must submit the commitment form prior to closed won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
and( $User.Bypass_Validation__c = false,
left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Opp_TraditionalEnrollment , 15),
ispickval(Post_Verto_Plans__c, "Already Committed To Plans"),
IsWon = true,
Commitment_Form_Complete__c = false,
or( ischanged(Post_Verto_Plans__c ), ischanged(StageName ), ischanged( Commitment_Form_Complete__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This student must submit the commitment form prior to Closed Won.
